name: Spaghetti Time
description:
The Mafia have come to shut down your pasta establishment, but it's one minute until closing time and you still have patrons to serve! Fill them all with spaghetti before it's too late!

left mouse - Fire

WASD - Move

Escape - Quit

Credits:

Birdy - Art

BigHugeJake - Sounds/Music

Evil Scotsman - Programming
